summary:
This mod adds my characters Erin, Sienna, Rowan, Anja, Amarie and Sigrid as followers. You can find them in the Drunken Huntsman, in Whiterun, the armory shop owned by two elves.

The mod is standalone, so you don't need any other mod to make it work.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=yellow]
[size=3]---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
You can not use my assets in any mods/files that are being sold, for money, on Steam Workshop or other platforms
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/size]
[/color][/center]

Name: Ashara's Erin and Sienna followers
Version: 5.1
Date: 10-05-2013
Category: Companions - Other
Requirements: Latest Skyrim official patch
Author(s): Ashara
Source:
* On Nexus: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32978
* On Steam: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=131417482
* Russian version by Witoscha on Modgames: modgames.net/load/251-1-0-15580
* French version by Sylom: http://www.confrerie-des-traducteurs.fr/skyrim/mods/personnages/compagnons/compagnons_dashara.php

[center]Thanks to mattyb89, Hodilton, EmadWasfi and Curry Gaming for the showcasing videos:

[youtube]HLSY8anSFIo[/youtube] [youtube]0Q3G4CdNt6I[/youtube] [youtube]VAr5bYmM-FQ[/youtube] [youtube]ymPvr_c_UsU[/youtube][/center]
[center][size=14][color=yellow]Description
==========================================================================================================================================[/size][/color]
This mod adds my characters Erin, Sienna, Rowan, Anja, Amarie and Sigrid as followers.
* Erin specialises in archery (with either a bow or a crossbow), two-handed weapons and light armour.
* Sienna is good with one-handed weapons, archery and light armour.
* Rowan is a pure mage specialised in destruction and restoration.
* Anja is good with two-handed weapons and heavy armour.
* Amarie is a spellsword that can use on-handed weapons and also destruction and restoration magic.
* Sigrid is good with one-handed weapons and heavy armour.

I've set them as essential (so they cannot die), and the five of them are marriable. Their morality is set to "Any crime" so thay will commit any crime you ask.

You can find them in the Drunken Huntsman, in Whiterun, the armory shop owned by two elves.

The mod is standalone, so you don't need any other mod to make it work. But I recommend that you use UFO (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14037) to add to these followers all the functionalities added by that mod.

Changing their body shape
-------------------------------
They use the UNP base body as default, if you want to change it to another body mod:

* Changing it to another UNP compatible body (UNP Slim, UNPB, UNPB-BBP, UNPC, etc):
** Copy the nif files of the body mod you want to use to the DataMeshesAsharaErin Follower folder

* Changing it to another body mod
** Copy the mesh files (.nif) of the body mod you want to use to the DataMeshesAsharaErin Follower folder

For Erin and Rowan:
** Copy the texture files (.dds) of the body mod you want to use to the DataTexturesAsharaErin Followerfemale folder. Beware that you may see a neck seam on Erin and Rowan if doing it. If there is a set of textures of the Temptress race made for the body you are using, you can copy those textures (including the face textures), to avoid the neck seam problem.
For Sienna and Amarie:
** Copy the texture files (.dds) of the body mod you want to use to the DataTexturesAsharaErin FollowerSiennaFemale folder. Beware that you may see a neck seam on Sienna and Amarie if doing it, so I recommend that you also copy a set of face textures compatible with the body you are going to use. My original Sienna character is a vanilla Imperial and my original Amarie character is a vanilla High elf.
For Anja:
** Copy the texture files (.dds) of the body mod you want to use to the DataTexturesAsharaErin FollowerAnjaFemale folder. Beware that you may see a neck seam on Anja if doing it, so I recommend that you also copy a set of face textures compatible with the body you are going to use. My original Anja character is a vanilla Nord.
For Sigrid:
** Copy the texture files (.dds) of the body mod you want to use to the DataTexturesAsharaErin FollowerSigridFemale folder. Beware that you may see a neck seam on Sigrid if doing it, so I recommend that you also copy a set of face textures compatible with the body you are going to use. My original Sigrid character is a vanilla Nord.

Find them if they get lost
---------------------------------
If you want to find them you can use the console command:

player.moveto RefId

and instead of RefId use the RefId of the follower you want to find:

* Erin -> xx00639A
* Sienna -> xx009423
* Rowan -> xx00d4d7
* Anja -> xx00D4D8
* Amarie -> xx0125a5
* Sigrid -> xx014614

where xx is the order in which this mod is loaded (you must use that number, not xx). You can see that number in Nexus Mod Manager Plugin list or use the console in game and type:
help Rowan
you'll see some items and numbers, one of them will be like this:
_NPC Rowan (xx00BF38)
instead of xx you'll see there the load order number for my mod in your game.

That will teleport your character where the follower is.

The recuiting dialogue doesn't appear
--------------------------------------
Install the mod, save the game and exit Skyrim completely.
Launch the game and load the saved game. Now you should see the "Follow me" line when talking to them. Skyrim has problems loading dialogues the first time you install a mod.

[size=14][color=yellow]Required mods
==========================================================================================================================================[/size][/color]
None.

[size=14][color=yellow]Install
==========================================================================================================================================[/size][/color]
Install using Nexus Mod Manager (NMM)
-------------------------------------
1. Download the file
2. Select the file in the Mods tab of NMM, and click on the "Activates the selected mod" button.

If asked if you want to overwrite existing files say "Yes to all".


Manual install
--------------
1. Extract the files of this mod to a temporary location (you can use 7zip: http://www.7-zip.org, to unzip them) and chek the folder structure.
2. Copy to (install folder)SkyrimData:
.- the AsharaErinFollower.esp
.- the meshes folder
.- the textures folder
3. Open the Skyrim launcher and in "Data files" check the AsharaErinFollower.esp. Make sure that the esp is loaded after Skyrim.esm and Update.esm and that all three files are active.

If asked if you want to overwrite existing files say "Yes to all".

[size=14][color=yellow]Uninstall
==========================================================================================================================================[/size][/color]
Uninstall using Nexus Mod Manager (NMM)
-------------------------------------
1. Select the file in the Mods tab of NMM, and click on the "Deactivates the selected mod" button.

Manual uninstall
----------------
1. Delete:
.- the AsharaErinFollower.esp
.- the folder texturesactorscharacterfacegendatafacetintAsharaErinFollower.esp and its contents
.- the folder texturesAsharaErin Follower and its contents
.- the folder meshesactorscharacterFaceGenDataFaceGeomAsharaErinFollower.esp and its contents
.- the folder meshesAsharaErin Follower and its contents

[size=14][color=yellow]Incompatibility
==========================================================================================================================================[/size][/color]
* The mod "Female NPC Animation Micro-Fix by BouncySpartan68" (On Steam Workshop), can freeze the NPCs and make them unable to follow you (thanks to TwoToedCowboy for reporting this).

[size=14][color=yellow]Known issues or bugs
==========================================================================================================================================[/size][/color]
None that I am aware of. If you find anything, please tell me.

[size=14][color=yellow]Tutorials
==========================================================================================================================================[/size][/color]
* [url=http://wiki.tesnexus.com/index.php?title=Adding_a_Follower_NPC_to_Skyrim]Adding a follower NPC to Skyrim[/url]
* [url=http://wiki.tesnexus.com/index.php?title=Creating_a_custom_race_for_Skyrim]Creating a custom race for Skyrim[/url]
* [url=http://wiki.tesnexus.com/index.php?title=Using_a_face_made_with_Chargen_Extension_on_an_NPC_for_Skyrim]Using a face made with CharGen Extension on an NPC for Skyrim[/url]
* [url=http://wiki.tesnexus.com/index.php?title=User:SydneyB]Other Tutorials[/url]

[size=14][color=yellow]History
==========================================================================================================================================[/size][/color]
5.1, 10-05-2014 - Changed Sienna's hair.
5.0, 04-05-2014 - Added Sigrid as a follower. Updated Sienna's and Amarie's faces to the last versions of my own characters' faces. Fixed their AI packages: now they will return to the Drunken Huntsman when dismissed instead of staying where they are.
4.1, 30-12-2013 - Updated Amarie's face to the one I made for her using CharGen Extension. Fixed the body meshes properties to better hide the neck seam.
4.0, 14-12-2013 - Added my character Amarie as a follower.
3.1, 31-05-2013 - fixed Anja's race as unplayable.
3.0, 27-03-2013 - added my characters Rowan and Anja as followers.
2-0, 14-03-2013 - added my character Sienna as a follower. Made a custom class and a custom combat style for Erin. Added a RefId for Erin.
1.0, 08-03-2013 - Initial release.

[size=14][color=yellow]Contact
==========================================================================================================================================[/size][/color]
You can contact me leaving a comment at the mod's thread, sending me a PM or leaving a comment at the mod's thread.

You can find me on Nexus as SydneyB: http://www.tesnexus.com/modules/members/index.php?id=259193.
You can find me on the Bethesda official forums as Ashara: http://www.bethsoft.com/bgsforums/index.php?showuser=364891.
You can find me on Clan Dlan as Ashara: http://www.clandlan.net/foros/index.php?showuser=6932.

[size=14][color=yellow]Credits
==========================================================================================================================================[/size][/color]
Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim.
Thanks to Dimon for the UNP female body.
Thanks to Phygit for the female feet meshes.
Thanks to MrTroubleMaker for the female hand meshes.
Thanks to LogRaam for the eye textures.
Thanks to HumanNature66 for the eye lashes meshes.

Erin's credits:
Thanks to Radioragae for porting the hair to Skyrim, to Zzjay for fixing it, and to Ren for the original hair for Oblivion.

Rowan's credits:
Thanks to Apachii for porting the hair to Skyrim and to Helga for the original hair.

Erin and Rowan's credits:
Thanks to Psychos1s for the temptress race textures and headmesh and to BellaGail and Navetsea for the original textures.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18717][img]http://farm9.staticflickr.com/8434/7722550578_0ed2414e53.jpg[/img][/url]

Sienna's credits:
Thanks to Hellosanta for porting the hair to Skyrim and to Peggy Zone for the original hair.

Anja's credits:
Thanks to Apachii for porting the hair to Skyrim and to Newsea for the original hair.
Thanks to Zzjay for the face textures and BellaGail for the original textures.

Amarie's credits:
Thanks to Apachii for porting the hair to Skyrim and to Susii for the original hair.

Sigrid's credits:
Thanks to HoneyVanity for the face and body textures.
Thanks to Tetrodoxin for the freckles.
Thanks to Hellosanta for the sweat map.
Thanks to Apachii for the hair and also to Anto and Newsea for some of parts used in making it.

Sienna and Amarie's credits:
Thanks to Maevan2 for the face and body textures.

Sienna and Sigrid's credits:
Thanks to Hellosanta for the brows.

Sienna, Anja, Amarie and Sigrid's credits:
Thanks to SvarogNL for the Fitness body.
Thanks to RAN46 for the headmesh.

Thanks to VRDaphni for teaching me how to add a face created with CharGen Extension to an NPC.
Thanks to Zzjay for the tutorial on how to hide the neck seam.
Thanks to Expired6978 for the RaceMenu and the Chargen Extension mods.
Thanks to LHammonds for the Readme Generator this file was based on: [url=http://hammondslegacy.com/obmm/tools_readme_generator1.asp]http://hammondslegacy.com/obmm/tools_readme_generator1.asp[/url]
Thanks to Nexus for the a one-stop-shop resource for authors and players.
Thanks to all the modding community for all their tutorials, tools and help. Especially, thanks to the Clan Dlan, Tes Adventures, Bethesda Official Forum and the Nexus communities.
Thanks to all of you that are using this mod and are helping me to improve it with your suggestions.

[size=14][color=yellow]Tools used
==========================================================================================================================================[/size][/color]
Construction Kit (available on Steam)
Expired6978's CharGen Extension - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36925/?
Turulo's NPC Nif Merge - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40494/?
7zip - http://www.7-zip.org/
Readme Generator - http://lhammonds.game-host.org/obmm/tools_readme_generator1.asp

[size=14][color=yellow]Permissions
==========================================================================================================================================[/size][/color]
You can reuse my work in this mod into your own mod but all I ask in return is that you give me credit if you distribute any part of this mod. I've used some assets that don't belong to me and that have their own usage permission rules:
* If you want to reuse the body meshes you must credit Dimon and release your mod on Nexus.
* If you want to reuse the feet meshes you must credit Phygit.
* If you want to reuse the hand meshes you must credit MrTroubleMaker.
* If you want to reuse the eye textures you must ask LogRaam first and credit him if granted permission.
* If you want to reuse the eyelashes meshes you must ask HumanNature66 first and credit him if granted permission.
* If you want to reuse Erin's hair on an NPC you must ask Zzjay first and credit her, Radioragae and Ren if granted permission.
* If you want to reuse Erin and Rowan's body, face textures and the head nif you must ask Psychos1s first and credit him, BellaGail and Navetsea if granted permission.
* If you want to reuse Sienna's hair on an NPC you must ask Hellosanta and Peggy Zone first and credit them if granted permission.
* If you want to reuse Sienna, Anja, Amarie and Sigrid's body normal map you must ask SvarogNL first and credit him if granted permission.
* If you want to reuse Sienna and Amarie's or Anja's headmesh you must credit RAN46.
* If you want to reuse Anja's face textures you must credit Zzjay and BellaGail.
* If you want to reuse Sienna and Amarie's face and body textures you must ask Maevan2 first and credit him if granted permission.
* If you want to reuse Sigrid's face and body textures you must ask HoneyVanity and Tetrodoxin first and credit them if granted permission.
* If you want to reuse Rowan's hair on an NPC you must ask Apachii first and credit her and Helga if granted permission.
* If you want to reuse Anja's hair on an NPC you must ask Apachii first and credit her and Newsea if granted permission.
* If you want to reuse Amarie's hair on an NPC you must ask Apachii first and credit her and Susii if granted permission.
* If you want to reuse Sigrid's hair on an NPC you must ask Apachii first and credit her Newsea and Anto if granted permission.

[size=14][color=yellow]My Skyrim mods
==========================================================================================================================================[/size][/color]

files.changelogHtml: 04-05-2014 - Added Sigrid as a follower. Updated Sienna's and Amarie's faces to the last versions of my own characters' faces. Fixed their AI packages: now they will return to the Drunken Huntsman when dismissed instead of staying where they are.
